thread.title: BRIEF-‍Ford Motor Credit Company Llc Says Issued And Sold EUR 612 Million Principal Amount Of Floating Rate Notes Due Dec 12, 2019

title: BRIEF-‍Ford Motor Credit Company Llc Says Issued And Sold EUR 612 Million Principal Amount Of Floating Rate Notes Due Dec 12, 2019
text: Market News February 22, 2018 / 6:42 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-‍Ford Motor Credit Company Llc Says Issued And Sold EUR 612 Million Principal Amount Of Floating Rate Notes Due Dec 12, 2019 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 22 (Reuters) - ‍FORD MOTOR CREDIT COMPANY LLC: * ‍FORD MOTOR CREDIT COMPANY LLC SAYS ISSUED AND SOLD EUR 612 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF FLOATING RATE NOTES DUE DEC 12, 2019 - SEC FILING​ Source text - ( bit.ly/2HD430h ) Further company coverage:
